alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 9:10PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, southwestern Washington and northwestern Johnson Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 910 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Tuckers Crossroad, or 12 miles west of Wrightsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Wrightsville, East Dublin, Lovett, Spann, Donovan, Chappells Mill, Tuckers Crossroad, Brewton and Nicklesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
